title: Resource utilization of oak fruit peel as biomass waste for the synthesis of carbon with graphene oxide-like composition and its composite with Mg1âˆ’xCaxFe2O4 for Cd(II) removal from water: characterization, magnetic properties, and potential adsorption study
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, 10,1920-1937
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00059E, Paper
Younes Zohrabi, Mohammad Ebrahim Ghazi, Morteza Izadifard, Alireza Valipour, Sivasankaran Ayyaru
In this study, carbon with graphene oxide (GO)-like composition (CGO) was prepared from oak fruit peel (OFP) using a room-temperature method.
